title: The "Ratna Avani" Emerald and Polki Diamond Haaram - A Verdant Dream
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features exquisite Zambian Emeralds (Panna) with high clarity and vibrant green hue. Adorned with Uncut Polki Diamonds
showcasing their natural brilliance. Finished with lustrous South Sea Pearls.
features: This Haaram showcases a classic South Indian design, expertly handcrafted by artisans in Hyderabad. It features a gracefully arranged chain of emeralds and polki diamonds. The pendant is the main design element of the necklace and has a circle design encrusted with gemstones and pearls.

description: This 'Ratna Avani' Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The use of authentic Zambian emeralds and uncut polki diamonds showcases the richness of South Indian heritage. Its durable construction ensures longevity, making it a treasured heirloom. The design seamlessly blends traditional aesthetics with a touch of modern sophistication.
